definitions.title: n.pr.dei
definitions.body: Am 5:26, prob. = As. kaivânu, planet Saturn (Ar. and Pers. kaywa0nun Syr. ke0won), regarded as god; orig. pronunc. [[כֵּיוׇן]] Schr:COT ad loc., cf. Kö:ii. 151 (pointing [[כִּיּוּן]] intended to suggest √ [[כון]] as something established, firm);kaimâ̆nu = kaiânu, acc. to Jen:Cosm. iii. 502 who der. fr. [[כון]] (cf. Thes; so Zim:BP 17); > Hpt:ZA ii. 266, 281 f. rds. [[כַּיׇּוׇן]] (for [[כְּאָמָן]]…), reading the Babyl. name Ka’âmânu; v. also M-A:JBL 1892, xi. 86 n. 39.
